title: That was rock: the TAMI/TNT Show
brief_description: Introduced and presented by Chuck Berry this video captures the essence of the sixties - the music, the dancing, the fashion and the culture. A wonderful trip down memory lane especially for the baby-boomers out there. Features magical performances by Chuck Berry, James Brown, Ray Charles and his Orchestra, Bo Diddley, Marvin Gaye, Gerry and the Pacemakers, Leslie Gore, Jan and Dean, Smokey Robinson and the Miracles, The Ronettes, The Rolling Stones, The Supremes, and Ike and Tina Turner and includes among the 37 songs, “Baby love” (The Supremes), “Time is on my side” (The Rolling Stones) and “You don’t own me” (Leslie Gore). Music directors - Jack Nitsche, Phil Spector.
